info.author: Ian Bicking
info.description:
WSGIOverlay is a high-level templating language, similar to HTML
Overlays and Server Side Includes.  It is intended to facilitate the
composing of multiple applications into a single web site, sharing
style and combining data from the applications into a single view.
This is done in a way that is neutral of underlying templating
languages and frameworks.

This can be installed from `the repository
<http://svn.pythonpaste.org/Paste/WSGIOverlay/trunk#egg=WSGIOverlay-dev>`_
with ``easy_install WSGIOverlay==dev``
info.name: WSGIOverlay
info.summary: High-level server-side include style templating language
info.html_description:
WSGIOverlay is a high-level templating language, similar to HTML Overlays and Server Side Includes. It is intended to facilitate the composing of multiple applications into a single web site, sharing style and combining data from the applications into a single view. This is done in a way that is neutral of underlying templating languages and frameworks.

This can be installed from the repository with easy_install WSGIOverlay==dev
